# Khue Nhu Nguyen
![](https://people.climate.columbia.edu/files/Users/2022/12/3140/IMG_20180422_134105.jpg)

I am intersted in Environmental Health and Occupational Health sciences. I currently work at [Lamont Doherty Earth Observatory](https://lamont.columbia.edu/) as a lab manager of the [Trace Organic lab (TraceOrg)](https://www.publichealth.columbia.edu/research/centers/niehs-center-environmental-health-northern-manhattan/facility-cores/translational-research-support-core). Our lab research projects include annalytical chemical method developments to quantify organic pollutants and biomarkers (pesticides, PAHs, BPA, Parabens)  and micro and nano-plastic quantification in various environmental samples (snow, sand, water) and biological samples (blood and tissues).
